page.title: 19TOURISM IN/AROUND CHAGFORD
page.content: Each year from about April to October Chagford becomes a popular place for tourists. We notice that visitors come from other parts of{Britain}and also from countries in{Europe}and from {North America. }Chagford is a good centre from which to pursue various activities, such as{walking on {Dartmoor, pony riding, fishing, bird {watching}and visiting the{seaside}by car. The {River Teign}is popular with tourists who in addition to walking along its banks also like to visit{ {Castle Drogo}and{Fingle Bridge.} The large reservoir at{Fernworthy Forest } is also a very popular tourist spot. Chagford has a relatively wide range of{Hotels}and{Guest Houses}in which to accommodate all its visitors. The { {Gidleigh Park Hotel}caters for the wealthiest of our visitors.
